synopsis.text:
Nagi's life at the Sanzenin Mansion has settled into a familiar rhythm, but a call from the Las Vegas police disrupts the calm, revealing they possess an item belonging to her late father. This revelation stirs up memories of a parent she never knew, leading Nagi to embark on a journey to collect her father's belongings.

Meanwhile, Ayasaki Hayate, Nagi's butler and bodyguard, finds himself in a whirlwind of chaos as he tries to manage Nagi's insecurities and laziness, while also fending off frequent kidnapping attempts. His life takes a dramatic turn when a mysterious girl named Ruri arrives, claiming to be his sister.

As if these complications weren't enough, Hayate soon finds himself entangled in the dark and messy affairs of the Sanzenin family. Unexpected relatives, secrets from the past, and even a cross-dressing curse all threaten to overwhelm him. Will Hayate be able to navigate these challenges and protect Nagi, or will these new complications prove to be his undoing?

This original anime story, personally crafted by the manga's creator Kenjiro Hata, promises a thrilling adventure filled with unexpected twists and turns. Join Nagi, Hayate, and Maria as they navigate this new chapter in their lives, where secrets will be revealed, and bonds will be tested.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
